name: Killin'Typo
description:
You're gonna need a keyboard to play this game!

Main theme was composed by Xani Beats

This game was made on Godot 4.0.

A short/endless experience typing game. Kill zombies as many as you can by writting the word above them right before they catch you.

I made this little game to pratice my coding and art skills, I don't have plans to publish any updates, unless it's a bug-fix related that makes the entire game unplayable due godot.

Anyway, have a nice day! hope ya like this little game.
